title: Dan Deacon: Deacon-structing Dan
description: Musician Dan Deacon talks about his love of audience participation and using his natural singing voice on his new album, Mystic Familiar. Then, Dan plays a game about board games with mundane themes.
copyright: Copyright 2012-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Dan Deacon: Deacon-structing Dan
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Musician and composer Dan Deacon talks about his love of audience participation and plays a game about well-regarded board games with mundane themes.
itunes:subtitle: Musician and composer Dan Deacon talks about his love of audience participation and plays a game about well-regarded board games with mundane themes.
content:encoded: Musician Dan Deacon talks about his love of audience participation and using his natural singing voice on his new album, Mystic Familiar. Then, Dan plays a game about board games with mundane themes.
